record.jsxtip: Fired when the user clicks on this button or when this button has focus and the user presses the space or enter keys; also fired when the user presses the bound hot key (if any). This event is also fired by the doExecute() method of the ToolbarButton class.
Fired after the button state has changed through user interaction.
Fired immediately after this object is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
